meanings.definition: Nine times as great or as numerous.
meanings.sent1: The giant pumpkin was ninefold larger than the tiny one.
meanings.sent2: The population of the city was ninefold larger than that of the village.
meanings.sent3: The cat's appetite seemed ninefold greater when it smelled fish.
meanings.sent4: Her joy at winning the race was ninefold greater than her disappointment at losing last time.
meanings.sent5: The mountain's shadow cast a ninefold darkness over the valley.

meanings.definition: To increase or be increased nine times.
meanings.sent1: She hoped to ninefold her savings by investing wisely.
meanings.sent2: The company's profits ninefolded after the new product launch.
meanings.sent3: The magician's hat seemed to ninefold in size as he pulled out more and more rabbits.
meanings.sent4: The rumor about the treasure hunt ninefolded in excitement as more people joined in.
meanings.sent5: The flowers in the garden seemed to ninefold in beauty after the rain.
